Description: Bronze group: Isis suckling Harpocrates flanked by Mut and Nephthys; three uraei at front; gilt on Isis's headdress and uraei.
Curator's comments: Published: Albersmeier, Untersuchungen zu den Frauenstatuen, 49 n 300; pl. 86b.
Exhibition history: 19th Nov 2011- 11 Mar 2012. Richmond , VA, Virginia museum of Fine Art. Mummy. The inside story. Mar - Oct 2012. Brisbane, Queensland Museum South Bank.
